reason: Question asks about frequency limits (횟수 제한) for sick leave approval, but source text discusses approval conditions and period determination, not frequency limits. Answer does not address the question.
Question asks about pay grade advancement (승급) during sick leave, but source text contains nothing about 승급. Answer is identical content to q_4_1172 and does not address the question.

Question asks specifically about required documents (필요한 서류), but answer is a raw dump of the entire 공무상 병가제도 section without focusing on documents. Answer also extends far beyond source.text with content from items (5) and footnotes not in cited source.
Duplicate answer with q_4_1178 (nearly identical content). Question asks about period calculation (기간 계산) which the source does not specifically explain.
Duplicate answer with q_4_1178 and q_4_1179. Same 공무상 병가제도 content dumped for a different question about exceptions (예외 사항).

Duplicate answer with q_4_1172 (same 병가의 승인 source text). Question asks about the most important condition (가장 중요한 조건) but answer just dumps the source text without identifying any specific condition.
Question asks about effect on teacher status (교원의 신분에 미치는 영향), but source text contains nothing about status effects. Duplicate answer with q_4_1172/q_4_1185.
Question asks about handling civil complaints (민원 대응), which is not covered in the source text at all. Duplicate answer with q_4_1172/q_4_1185/q_4_1186.
Duplicate answer with q_4_1178/q_4_1179/q_4_1181. Same 공무상 병가제도 content with only minor formatting differences.
Duplicate answer with q_4_1188. Question (전체적인 내용 요약) is essentially the same as q_4_1188 (핵심 포인트 정리), and answers are nearly identical.
